entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spring 2024 repo health check #101456
  • \ character in directory name prevents compilation #101452
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.SequenceEqual #101448
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable to iterate through nested array in object returned from API #101446
  • HTTPS requests fail on Ubuntu 24.04 Noble ARM32 due to bundled certs "NotTimeValid" error #101444
  • [API Proposal]: Determine Reference Type Nullability during runtime #101438
  • List Add is way slower (almost 3 times) in `net9.0 preview 3` than with `net8.0` #101437
  • [browser] `System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests` fails with out of memory #101436
  • [mono][wasm] UnmanagedCallersOnly is not being called after publish #101434
  • Arm64 SVE: Size of vector is always 128bits #101433
  • [mono] Mono doesn't allocate nested structures to the same offsets as CoreCLR #101432
  • [mono][ios] `ToFrozenSet` crashes on iOS devices with `8.0.3` release #101427
    8.0.x
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Tests.WorkItemExecution CI timeout on net9.0-osx-Debug-x64-Mono_Minijit_Debug-OSX.1200.Amd64.Open #101423
  • Incorrect String Comparison Results with ICU #101422
    Future
  • [browser][MT] WebGL with threads #101421
    9.0.0
  • MIssing runtime deps for 8.0.4 #101413
  • [mono] Refactor switch statements in `process_bb` to reduce redundancy #101412
    Future
  • Stale async task when flooding the network with too many async http requests #101411
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests - Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #101409
  • [SOS] Intermittent Connection Issues with HttpClient in .NET 6 #101407

Closed

  • JIT/opt/Vectorization/UnrollEqualsStartsWith/UnrollEqualsStartsWith.dll takes 2 hours to complete in gcstress on osx-arm64 #101453
    9.0.0
  • Add a non-generic IReadOnlyCollection interface #23337
    Future
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #92378
    9.0.0
  • Infinite recursion between System.Threading.Lock and System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ClassConstructorRunner in NativeAOT #99663
    9.0.0
  • How to use CoSetProxyBlanket in P/Invoke source generator? #101157
  • [MONO][Wasm] Potential function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #99514
    9.0.0
  • Regex.Match is different between .NET 8.0.4 and .NET Framework 4.8 #101223
    9.0.0
  • [browser][hybrid] drop wrap_error_root,wrap_no_error_root #98365
    9.0.0
  • Bump iOS/tvOS minimum supported version to 12.2 #91736
    9.0.0
  • Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream #100773
  • I think that `Partition.Trim(...)` from `ArraySharedPool<T>` may be doing some unnecessary work #101025
  • System.Text.Json serializing null becomes "null" as 'serialized' object #101419
  • NativeAOT in Unity #101414
  • HTTPClient is not reusing the SSL/TLS1.2 session and does handshake on every request #100119

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Merge #92901 into release/8.0-staging #101459
    needs-area-label
  • Add test for boxing byreflike fail. #101458
    needs-area-label
  • Add implicit operator ROS<string?> for StringValues #101457
    area-Extensions-Primitives, 9.0.0
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host
  • [cdac] Read/store globals from contract descriptor #101450
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add more logging to HTTP3 and QUIC code #101449
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix failing ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream for Http3 #101447
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix condition for disabling extra checks in verify_class_overrides #101445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Add support for non-generic method instance #101442
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable frequently failing tests #101439
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add TensorPrimitives.Max/MinNumber #101435
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Initial prototype for strength reduction #101431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix checks to accommodate register wraparounds in multi-reg ops #101430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix big endian issue in Interlocked test cases #101429
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Disable most of S.T.Json trimming tests on AOT the right way #101418
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Run System.Net.Http trimming tests with AOT #101416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • enable dependabot for github actions #101406
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Disable UnrollEqualsStartsWith for gcstress. The test takes very long time. #101455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix comment #101440
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ReadAsStreamAsync_Cancellation data race #101428
    area-System.Net
  • Switch s390x and PPC64 to Mariner host OS, not ancient Ubuntu #101424
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101305
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 8.0.6
  • Fix incorrect suffix search for alternation with RegexOptions.RightToLeft #101408
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0-staging] crashinfo.cpp/crashinfounix.cpp: use off_t instead of off64_t #101272
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Fix function signature mismatch in m2n invoke #101106
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][hybrid] drop `wrap_error_root`, `wrap_no_error_root` #101390
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono] Optimize startup vtable setup #101312
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #101397
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Miscellaneous startup optimizations #101263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove AD0001 from NoWarn #101404
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: metrics for profile consistency, gdv, devirt... #101403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump minimum Apple OS versions #101342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dedup UnboundedChannel and UnboundedPriorityChannel #101396
    area-System.Threading.Channels, 9.0.0
  • Remove some dead code from SharedArrayPool #101410
    area-System.Buffers
  • Adjust the calleeSavedRegs on top frame for LoongArch64/RISCV64 #100962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Use BitOperations.RoundUpToPowerOf2 in more places #101405
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101144
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Avoid rooting X509Certificate2 in SslSessionCache #101167
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [LoongArch64] amend the LoongArch64Classifier::Classify for passing struct. #101365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Reapply params ReadOnlySpan overloads without params keyword #101308
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implement Activity.AddLink #101381
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add managed blocking info for lock and monitor waits #101192
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] TypeDescriptor threading fixes #101306
    Servicing-approved, area-System.ComponentModel, 6.0.31
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #101260
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.31
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Expose the `ConvertToIntegerNative` APIs #100993
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Simplify managed MetadataImport creation #101353
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add CreateWhileLessThan* #100949
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Merge #91646 and #91708 into release/8.0-staging #101313
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Rework ProbabilisticMap character checks in SearchValues #101001
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WASI] update SDK 22 and wasmtime 19.0.2 #101392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [browser] More meaningful code in browser template #101287
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix data race leading to a deadlock when opening QuicStream #101250
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono] Fix `LLVMArgWasmVtypeAsScalar` when a method doesn't set its return value #101299
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [LoongArch64] Enable printing disassembly instructions under release mode for JitDisasm. #101281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
